CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Monday.Com Ltd Work OS is an open platform that democratizes the power of software so organizations can easily build work management tools and software applications to fit their every need. The platform intuitively connects people to processes and systems, empowering teams to excel in every aspect of their work while creating an environment of transparency in business. Monday.com operates in Tel Aviv, New York, San Francisco, Miami, Chicago, London, Sydney, Sao Paulo, and Tokyo.
